thread.title: Nice and small Hotel close to l´Arc de Triumph
thread.title_full: Nice and small Hotel close to l´Arc de Triumph - Review of Hotel La Villa des Ternes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jacqueline K
title: Nice and small Hotel close to l´Arc de Triumph
text: Paris à pied! Nice, renovated Hotel. Bathroom and in particular l´Occitaine products are higly appreciated. Not so good the hair dryer! For small hands not really handy. You can have a small breakfast at 5.30 am if needed. Hotel is located in foot distance to ´l´Arc de Triumph and within 30 min you can reach the Eiffel Tower.
